gold.name: CGI
gold.description: Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world. We are insights-driven and outcomes-based to help accelerate returns on your investments.

bronze.name: OCLC
bronze.description: At OCLC, we exist because what is known must be shared. OCLC makes the technology that powers the world's libraries, and if that seems low-tech, you haven't visited a library lately. We challenge your mind while keeping your heart.
